mapper.select:
SELECT rn AS no, id, tahun, triwulan, noMohon, status, kodeKegiatan, namaKegiatan, kodeAkun, namaAkun, kodeKomponen, namaKomponen, kasKeluar FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT b.i_id AS ID, b.c_angg_tahun AS tahun, c_bku_status AS status, b.c_angg_triwulan AS triwulan, b.i_bkuno_mohon AS noMohon, NVL (k.c_kegiatan, '-') AS kodeKegiatan, NVL (k.n_kegiatan, '-') AS namaKegiatan, a.c_akun AS kodeAkun, a.n_akun AS namaAkun, NVL (n.c_komponen, '-') AS kodeKomponen, NVL (n.n_komponen, '') AS namaKomponen, r.v_kas_keluar AS kasKeluar FROM tmbkusbop b INNER JOIN tmbkusboprinci r ON b.i_id = r.i_idbkubop INNER JOIN trsekolah s ON b.i_idsekolah = s.i_id LEFT JOIN trkategorikomponen n ON r.i_idkomponen = n.i_id LEFT JOIN trbas a ON r.i_idbas = a.i_id LEFT JOIN tmrkaskegiatan k ON b.i_idkegiatan = k.i_id WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_trx = #{kodeTrx} AND r.v_kas_keluar > '0' AND b.c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND b.i_bkuno = 0 AND d_posting IS NULL AND b.i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND b.c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND c_bku_status = #{status} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusbank bk WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = bk.c_angg_tahun AND to_char(b.i_idsekolah) = bk.i_idsekolah AND bk.i_idbku = b.i_id AND bk.c_angg_sumbdana = 2 AND bk.c_bank_status = 1)
and upper(k.c_kegiatan) like '%'||upper(#{kodeKegiatanFilter})||'%'
and upper(k.n_kegiatan) like '%'||upper(#{namaKegiatanFilter})||'%'
and upper(k.c_akun) like '%'||upper(#{kodeAkunFilter})||'%'
and upper(k.n_akun) like '%'||upper(#{namaAkunFilter})||'%'
ORDER BY b.i_bkuno_mohon ) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT rn AS no, id, tahun, triwulan, noMohon, status, kodeKegiatan, namaKegiatan, kodeAkun, namaAkun, kodeKomponen, namaKomponen, kasKeluar FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT b.i_id AS ID, b.c_angg_tahun AS tahun, c_bku_status AS status, b.c_angg_triwulan AS triwulan, b.i_bkuno_mohon AS noMohon, NVL (k.c_kegiatan, '-') AS kodeKegiatan, NVL (k.n_kegiatan, '-') AS namaKegiatan, a.c_akun AS kodeAkun, a.n_akun AS namaAkun, NVL (n.c_komponen, '-') AS kodeKomponen, NVL (n.n_komponen, '') AS namaKomponen, r.v_kas_keluar AS kasKeluar FROM tmbkusbop b INNER JOIN tmbkusboprinci r ON b.i_id = r.i_idbkubop INNER JOIN trsekolah s ON b.i_idsekolah = s.i_id LEFT JOIN trkategorikomponen n ON r.i_idkomponen = n.i_id LEFT JOIN trbas a ON r.i_idbas = a.i_id LEFT JOIN tmrkaskegiatan k ON b.i_idkegiatan = k.i_id WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_trx = #{kodeTrx} AND r.v_kas_keluar > '0' AND b.c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND b.i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND b.i_bkuno = 0 AND d_posting IS NULL AND b.c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND (c_bku_status = #{dari} OR c_bku_status = #{hingga}) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusbank bk WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = bk.c_angg_tahun AND to_char(b.i_idsekolah) = bk.i_idsekolah AND bk.i_idbku = b.i_id AND bk.c_angg_sumbdana = 2 AND bk.c_bank_status = 1)
and upper(k.c_kegiatan) like '%'||upper(#{kodeKegiatanFilter})||'%'
and upper(k.n_kegiatan) like '%'||upper(#{namaKegiatanFilter})||'%'
and upper(k.c_akun) like '%'||upper(#{kodeAkunFilter})||'%'
and upper(k.n_akun) like '%'||upper(#{namaAkunFilter})||'%'
ORDER BY b.i_bkuno_mohon ) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT rn AS no, id, tahun, triwulan, noMohon, status, kodeKegiatan, namaKegiatan, kodeAkun, namaAkun, kodeKomponen, namaKomponen, kasKeluar FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT b.i_id AS ID, b.c_angg_tahun AS tahun, c_bku_status AS status, b.c_angg_triwulan AS triwulan, b.i_bkuno_mohon AS noMohon, NVL (k.c_kegiatan, '-') AS kodeKegiatan, NVL (k.n_kegiatan, '-') AS namaKegiatan, a.c_akun AS kodeAkun, a.n_akun AS namaAkun, NVL (n.c_komponen, '-') AS kodeKomponen, NVL (n.n_komponen, '') AS namaKomponen, r.v_kas_keluar AS kasKeluar FROM tmbkusbop b INNER JOIN tmbkusboprinci r ON b.i_id = r.i_idbkubop INNER JOIN trsekolah s ON b.i_idsekolah = s.i_id LEFT JOIN trkategorikomponen n ON r.i_idkomponen = n.i_id LEFT JOIN trbas a ON r.i_idbas = a.i_id LEFT JOIN tmrkaskegiatan k ON b.i_idkegiatan = k.i_id WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_trx LIKE 'P%' AND r.v_kas_keluar > '0' AND b.c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND b.i_bkuno = 0 AND d_posting IS NULL AND b.i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND b.c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND (c_bku_status = #{dari} OR c_bku_status = #{hingga}) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusbank bk WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = bk.c_angg_tahun AND to_char(b.i_idsekolah) = bk.i_idsekolah AND bk.i_idbku = b.i_id AND bk.c_angg_sumbdana = 2 AND bk.c_bank_status = 1)
and upper(k.c_kegiatan) like '%'||upper(#{kodeKegiatanFilter})||'%'
and upper(k.n_kegiatan) like '%'||upper(#{namaKegiatanFilter})||'%'
and upper(k.c_akun) like '%'||upper(#{kodeAkunFilter})||'%'
and upper(k.n_akun) like '%'||upper(#{namaAkunFilter})||'%'
ORDER BY b.i_bkuno_mohon ) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT COUNT (*) AS banyak FROM tmbkusbop b INNER JOIN tmbkusboprinci r ON b.i_id = r.i_idbkubop INNER JOIN trsekolah s ON b.i_idsekolah = s.i_id LEFT JOIN trkategorikomponen n ON r.i_idkomponen = n.i_id LEFT JOIN trbas a ON r.i_idbas = a.i_id LEFT JOIN tmrkaskegiatan k ON b.i_idkegiatan = k.i_id WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND r.v_kas_keluar > '0' AND b.c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND c_trx = #{kodeTrx} AND b.i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND b.c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND c_bku_status = '0' AND b.i_bkuno = 0 AND d_posting IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusbank bk WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = bk.c_angg_tahun AND to_char(b.i_idsekolah) = bk.i_idsekolah AND bk.i_idbku = b.i_id AND bk.c_angg_sumbdana = 2 AND bk.c_bank_status = 1) UNION ALL SELECT COUNT (*) AS banyak FROM r.i_idbas = a.i_id LEFT JOIN tmrkaskegiatan k ON b.i_idkegiatan = k.i_id WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_trx = #{kodeTrx} AND r.v_kas_keluar > '0' AND b.c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND b.i_idsekolah = ON b.i_idkegiatan = k.i_id WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND r.v_kas_keluar > '0' AND b.c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND c_trx = #{kodeTrx} AND b.i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND b.c_angg_triwulan = bk.i_idsekolah AND bk.i_idbku = b.i_id AND bk.c_angg_sumbdana = 2 AND bk.c_bank_status = 1) UNION ALL SELECT COUNT (*) AS banyak FROM tmbkusbop b INNER JOIN tmbkusboprinci r ON b.i_id = r.i_idbkubop WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND r.v_kas_keluar > '0' AND b.c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND c_trx = #{kodeTrx} AND b.i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND b.c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND c_bku_status = '3' SELECT SUM(kasKeluar) AS total FROM (SELECT r.v_kas_keluar AS kasKeluar FROM tmbkusbop b INNER JOIN tmbkusboprinci r ON b.i_id = r.i_idbkubop INNER JOIN trsekolah s ON b.i_idsekolah = s.i_id LEFT JOIN trkategorikomponen n ON r.i_idkomponen = n.i_id LEFT JOIN trbas a ON r.i_idbas = a.i_id LEFT JOIN tmrkaskegiatan k ON b.i_idkegiatan = k.i_id WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_trx LIKE 'P%' AND b.i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND b.c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND r.v_kas_keluar > '0' AND b.c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND b.i_bkuno = 0 AND d_posting IS NULL AND (c_bku_status = #{dari} OR c_bku_status = #{hingga}) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusbank bk WHERE b.c_angg_tahun = bk.c_angg_tahun AND to_char(b.i_idsekolah) = bk.i_idsekolah AND bk.i_idbku = b.i_id AND bk.c_angg_sumbdana = 2 AND bk.c_bank_status = 1) )
mapper.update: UPDATE TMBKUSBOP SET c_bku_status = #{statusSesudah}, I_PGUN_UBAH = #{id}, D_PGUN_UBAH = #{tanggal} WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_trx = #{kodeTrx} AND i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND c_bku_status = #{statusSebelum} AND c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND i_bkuno = 0 AND d_posting IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusboprinci WHERE i_idbkubop = tmbkusbop.i_id AND v_kas_keluar > '0' ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusbank bk WHERE TMBKUSBOP.c_angg_tahun = bk.c_angg_tahun AND to_char(TMBKUSBOP.i_idsekolah) = bk.i_idsekolah AND bk.i_idbku = TMBKUSBOP.i_id AND bk.c_angg_sumbdana = 2 AND bk.c_bank_status = 1)

UPDATE TMBKUSBOP SET c_bku_status = #{statusSesudah}, I_PGUN_UBAH = #{id}, D_PGUN_UBAH = #{tanggal} WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_trx = #{kodeTrx} AND i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND c_bku_status = #{statusSebelum} AND c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND i_bkuno = 0 AND d_posting IS NULL AND I_BKUNO_MOHON = #{noMohon} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusboprinci WHERE i_idbkubop = tmbkusbop.i_id AND v_kas_keluar > '0' ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusbank bk WHERE TMBKUSBOP.c_angg_tahun = bk.c_angg_tahun AND to_char(TMBKUSBOP.i_idsekolah) = bk.i_idsekolah AND bk.i_idbku = TMBKUSBOP.i_id AND bk.c_angg_sumbdana = 2 AND bk.c_bank_status = 1)

UPDATE TMBKUSBOP SET c_bku_status = #{statusSesudah}, I_PGUN_UBAH = #{id}, D_PGUN_UBAH = #{tanggal} WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_trx LIKE 'P%' AND i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND c_bku_status = #{statusSebelum} AND c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND i_bkuno = 0 AND d_posting IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusboprinci WHERE i_idbkubop = tmbkusbop.i_id AND v_kas_keluar > '0' ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusbank bk WHERE TMBKUSBOP.c_angg_tahun = bk.c_angg_tahun AND to_char(TMBKUSBOP.i_idsekolah) = bk.i_idsekolah AND bk.i_idbku = TMBKUSBOP.i_id AND bk.c_angg_sumbdana = 2 AND bk.c_bank_status = 1)
mapper.select: SELECT i_id AS ID FROM tmbkusbop WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_trx = #{kodeTrx} AND c_bku_koreksi = '0' AND i_idsekolah = #{idSekolah} AND i_bkuno = 0 AND d_posting IS NULL AND c_angg_triwulan = #{triwulan} AND c_bku_status IN ('0', '1', '2') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmbkusboprinci WHERE i_idbkubop = tmbkusbop.i_id AND v_kas_keluar > '0') ORDER BY i_bkuno_mohon
